titles.title: National Park System Advisory Board Reauthorization Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Act of August 21, 1935, to extend the authorization for the National Park System Advisory Board, and for other purposes.
National Park System Advisory Board Reauthorization Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-547.

bill.summary: National Park System Advisory Board Reauthorization Act of 2006 - Modifies provisions concerning the membership of the National Park System Advisory Board. Extends the authorization for the Board to January 1, 2016.
